entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, Tadoussac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.6°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to snow near midnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
